attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Players begin by stalking a mother on a subway station before violently raping her. They then move on to attack her two daughters described as virgin schoolgirls.
Players also enter 'freeform mode' where they can rape any woman and get other male game characters to join the attacks. This game is available to download on the internet.

rejection.details: Please contact Film classification board http://www.bbfc.co.uk/
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
